incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/12/2022 06:30 UTC  End time : 15/12/2022 15:00 UTC  Service impact : None Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some power supply work
Start time : 14/12/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 15/12/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to move an electrical cabinet
Start time : 14/12/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 14/12/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Cooling system equipment replacement.

The maintenance wont be completed in scheduled time. 
It has been postponed and will be rescheduled.
A new post will be created when the new schedule has been validated.
